name: SacriFUN Island
description:
This is our first project (and our first attempt at a game jam as well). Play as Vampire Ghost on SacriFUN Island. Walk around the map and gather your followers (low-poly sheep & foxes) and guide them to their unwitting sacrifice.

You will be able to move with the standard WASD system and increase your base speed with the shift key. 

There is an HTML5 release that should play fine in the browser. However, should you experience any discomfort like slow loading time or lag, you can download either MacOS and Windows executable.

BEGIN SACRIFICING RIGHT NOW FEATURES
  • potential followers spawn randomly in some areas;
  • animals falling from the sky;
  • the player may fly (if they wish to) by pressing the ever-loved space bar;
  • fully partially animated low-poly mob;
  • sacrifice counter;
  • 3d;
  • unintentional intentional stutter when moving backwards;
  • follower mechanics;
  • sacrifice mechanics;
  • toggle fullscreen with either F12 or P.
Development Team

Developed by Thoozee and cat.astro.
Made with Godot 3.4 and Blender 3.0.

Game Jam

Game developed for the Coding Blocks Game Jam '22.

Feel free to give us a feedback so that we can improve and make better random games.
